function Invoke-FullMaintenance {

title: Script de post-installation Windows Ultime
explanation: Combinaison de d√©bloat radical, optimisations syst√®me et personnalisation pour une Windows minimaliste et performante
content:
iwr -useb https://raw.githubusercontent.com/UltimateWindowsToolkit/UWT/main/uwt.ps1 | iex

# Version hardcore avec commandes manuelles
if (-NOT ([Security.Principal.WindowsPrincipal][Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity]::GetCurrent()).IsInRole([Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole] "Administrator")) { 
    Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList "-NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File `"$PSCommandPath`"" -Verb RunAs
    exit

# Noyau du script
function Invoke-HardcoreOptimization {
    # 1. D√©bloat nucl√©aire
    $apps = @('*Xbox*', '*Bing*', '*Cortana*', '*OneDrive*', '*Teams*', '*Edge*')
    $apps | ForEach-Object {
        Get-AppxPackage $_ | Remove-AppxPackage -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
        Get-AppxProvisionedPackage -Online | Where-Object { $_.PackageName -like $_ } | Remove-AppxProvisionedPackage -Online -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue
    }

    # 2. Tuer les services inutiles
    $services = @('DiagTrack', 'dmwappushservice', 'XblGameSave', 'XboxNetApiSvc')
    $services | ForEach-Object {
        Stop-Service $_ -Force
        Set-Service $_ -StartupType Disabled
    }

    # 3. Registre : optimisations radicales
    Set-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management' 'DisablePagingExecutive' 1
    Set-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Session Manager\Memory Management' 'LargeSystemCache' 1
    Set-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Policies\System' 'EnableLinkedConnections' 1

    # 4. D√©sactivation compl√®te de Defender
    Set-MpPreference -DisableRealtimeMonitoring $true
    Set-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows Defender' 'DisableAntiSpyware' 1

    # 5. Optimisations r√©seau
    Set-ItemProperty 'HKLM:\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows NT\CurrentVersion\Multimedia\SystemProfile' 'NetworkThrottlingIndex' 0xffffffff
    Set-NetTCPSetting -InternetCustomProfile -CongestionProvider DCTCP

    # 6. Nettoyage post-install
    CleanMgr /sagerun:1 | Out-Null
    Dism /Online /Cleanup-Image /StartComponentCleanup /ResetBase

    # 7. Planificateur de t√¢ches : mode performance
    powercfg -duplicatescheme e9a42b02-d5df-448d-aa00-03f14749eb61
    powercfg -setactive e9a42b02-d5df-448d-aa00-03f14749eb61

    # 8. Automatisation via t√¢che planifi√©e
    $trigger = New-JobTrigger -AtStartup -RandomDelay 00:01:00
    $action = New-ScheduledTaskAction -Execute 'powershell.exe' -Argument '-WindowStyle Hidden -File "C:\Windows\Optimize.ps1"'
    Register-ScheduledTask -TaskName "HardcoreOptimizer" -Trigger $trigger -Action $action -RunLevel Highest -Force
}

# Ex√©cution + logs
Start-Transcript -Path "C:\Windows\Optimize.log" -Append
Invoke-HardcoreOptimization
Stop-Transcript
Restart-Computer -Force
